Verses: 2 karththarukku Virodhamaagavum, Avar Abishegampanninavarukku Virodhamaagavum, Boomiyin Raajaakkal Ezhumbinindru, Adhigaarigal Egamaai Aalosanaipanni:
3 avargal Kattugalai Aruththu, Avargal Kayirugalai Nammaivittu Erindhupoduvom Engiraargal.
4 paralogaththil Veetrirukkiravar Nagaippaar; Aandavar Avargalai Igazhuvaar.
5 appozhudhu Avar Thamadhu Kobaththile Avargalode Pesi, Thamadhu Ukkiraththile Avargalaik Kalangappannuvaar.
6 naan Ennudaiya Parisuththa Parvadhamaagiya Seeyonmeedhil Ennudaiya Raajaavai Abishegampanni Vaiththen Endraar.
7 theermaanaththin Vivaram Solluven; Karththar Ennai Nokki: Neer Ennudaiya Kumaaran, Indru Naan Ummai Janippiththen;
8 ennaik Kelum, Appozhudhu Jaadhigalai Umakku Sudhandharamaagavum, Boomiyin Ellaigalai Umakku Sondhamaagavum Koduppen;
9 iruppukkolaal Avargalai Norukki, Kuyakkalaththaippol Avargalai Udaiththuppoduveer Endru Sonnaar.
10 ippodhum Raajaakkale, Unarvadaiyungal, Boomiyin Niyaayaadhipadhigale, Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.

12 kumaaran Kobangollaamalum, Neengal Vazhiyile Azhiyaamalum Irukkumpadikku, Avarai Muththanjeyyungal; Konjakkaalaththile Avarudaiya Kobam Patriyeriyum; Avarai Andikkollugira Yaavarum Baakkiyavaangal.
